segments.text: It ’ s rather cold . Isn ’ t it
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . What ’ s the climate like in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s mild . but it ’ s not always pleasant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which season do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like spring . The days are long and the nights are short . The flowers in blew . We go on picnics
segments.speaker: S2
